H0.text: Chemical properties are the type of properties of matter that can be considered alongside physical properties.

H1.text: Gas is a property of matter that can be considered physical.

H2.text: Mineral is a physical property of matter.

H3.text: Liquid is a property of matter that can be considered physical.

A4.text: Physical properties are contrasted with chemical properties which determine the way a material behaves in a chemical reaction.
